about_services_paragraph: At Max Vision Auto Detailing, in Argyroupoli, Athens, we're all about making your car look brand new again_ We offer expert cleaning, polishing, and protective coatings to give your vehicle that showroom shine_ Whether you want to refresh your ride or keep it looking its best, we've got you covered with top-notch service and results you'll love_
labocosmetica_installer_paragraph: MaxVision Car Detail is a certified installer of Labocosmetica_We have the exclusivity to protect your car with the best ceramic coating on the market today! This glass coating has a lifespan of 2 to 3 years, provides an extreme shine and is extremely dirt and water repellent!
follow_us_paragraph_1: Follow us on social media and stay up-to-date with our latest projects, promotions and so much more! We also have a
follow_us_paragraph_2: where we upload new videos of our auto detailing treatments every week_
